items.short_synopsis: It’s the early morning of January 1st, 2016. Óscar is feeling down: he’s gone to a nightclub with his ex-girlfriend, Vero, thinking he still has a chance with her. But he’s wrong. It’s the same nightclub where Ana works as a waitress. When the club closes, Ana and Óscar meet at a bar.

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.title: The New Years

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: Madrid, New Year’s Eve. Ana and Óscar meet for the first time on the night they both turn thirty. That night, their worlds collide in an unexpected romance that will unfold over an entire decade of New Year’s Eves.

seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.default_editorial: Catching fleeting glimpses of a relationship in motion, this innovative episodic drama is as profoundly moving as it is conceptually daring. Devastatingly observed realism and a novelistic evocation of time create an intimate portrait of two lovers across a decade, in all their messy imperfection.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Catching fleeting glimpses of a relationship in motion, this innovative episodic drama is as profoundly moving as it is conceptually daring. Devastatingly observed realism and a novelistic evocation of time create an intimate portrait of two lovers across a decade, in all their messy imperfection.

items.title: A Natural History of the Studio
items.short_synopsis: South African artist William Kentridge investigates life in the studio. He imagines his studio as an enlarged head, where multiple dialogues occur between the artist and himself. Kentridge begins interviewing his double. Soon, the whole studio is populated by Kentridge’s many selves.
items.default_editorial: Step inside the roving creative imagination of William Kentridge with this exclusive nine-part series. An ode to procrastination, pacing, and messy desks, this playful first episode sees the South African artist invoke a doppelgänger with whom to squabble over the intangible seeds of inspiration.

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

episode.label: Self-Portrait as a Coffee-Pot - Episode 1
episode.episode_title: A Natural History of the Studio

series.title: Self-Portrait as a Coffee-Pot

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.short_synopsis: During the COVID-19 pandemic, renowned South African artist William Kentridge opens the doors to his Johannesburg studio to lay bare his creative process. Combining animation, collage, performance, and conversations with doppelgängers, Kentridge reflects on culture, history, and political memory.

seasons.title: Self-Portrait as a Coffee-Pot
seasons.default_editorial: This colossal nine-part series is a generous invitation into the studio of South African artist William Kentridge. A rare glimpse into the workings of an industrious imagination, Self-Portrait as a Coffee Pot finds that process is not a means to an end, but the sum total of the work itself.
seasons.default_editorial_html: This colossal nine-part series is a generous invitation into the studio of South African artist William Kentridge. A rare glimpse into the workings of an industrious imagination, Self-Portrait as a Coffee Pot finds that process is not a means to an end, but the sum total of the work itself.

items.title: Bee
items.short_synopsis: Isabella Rossellini explores the deadly mating habits of bees. As the huge queen bee lays about all day producing eggs, a horny yet doomed drone bee awaits his new female lover.
items.default_editorial: Internecine squabbling, regal indolence, lecherous appetites—the queen bee runs a royal household like any other. Expounding on the division of sexual labor within the imperial headquarters, this sanguineous short weighs the pound of flesh taken as payment for the privilege of servicing the boss.

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.title: Green Porno and Other Shorts

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.short_synopsis: Isabella Rossellini slips into the roles of various animals to act out their mating rituals, reproductive habits, and parenting behaviors. Shapeshifting from a vengeful female spider to a wiggly worm, Rossellini reveals some of the stranger truths of the animal kingdom.
series.default_editorial: Would you like to learn about the sex lives of animals from… Isabella Rossellini? Directed by and starring the iconic actor as creatures big and small, these bite-sized shorts take us on a wild tour across the animal kingdom, recreated through puppetry, paper sets, and eye-popping DIY costumes.

seasons.short_synopsis: Isabella Rossellini explores the mating habits of creatures big and small, transforming into each animal to demonstrate their unique reproductive rituals. From sea life to insects, Rossellini presents a hands-on guide to the bizarre and beautiful nuances of animal sex.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: Isabella Rossellini explores the mating habits of creatures big and small, transforming into each animal to demonstrate their unique reproductive rituals. From sea life to insects, Rossellini presents a hands-on guide to the bizarre and beautiful nuances of animal sex.
seasons.title: Green Porno
seasons.default_editorial: With vaudevillian humor and keen scientific accuracy, Isabella Rossellini presents the ABCs of animal love life in these winking shorts, an online sensation upon their release. Showcasing a stunningly diverse array of sexual behavior, Green Porno playfully counters the binaries of our human world.
seasons.default_editorial_html: With vaudevillian humor and keen scientific accuracy, Isabella Rossellini presents the ABCs of animal love life in these winking shorts, an online sensation upon their release. Showcasing a stunningly diverse array of sexual behavior, Green Porno playfully counters the binaries of our human world.

seasons.short_synopsis: Isabella Rossellini returns to embody a range of creatures as they navigate the strange and often treacherous rituals of courtship. From displays of dominance to elaborate seduction tactics, Rossellini unpacks the surprising strategies animals use to attract a mate.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: Isabella Rossellini returns to embody a range of creatures as they navigate the strange and often treacherous rituals of courtship. From displays of dominance to elaborate seduction tactics, Rossellini unpacks the surprising strategies animals use to attract a mate.
seasons.title: Seduce Me
seasons.default_editorial: Enacting bizarre insect and animal mating rituals, Isabella Rossellini wittily plays on her glamorous persona in these eye-opening shorts. With brightly colored sets, ingenious props, and a winning sense of humor, the star delivers delightful lessons in the natural laws of sexual attraction.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Enacting bizarre insect and animal mating rituals, Isabella Rossellini wittily plays on her glamorous persona in these eye-opening shorts. With brightly colored sets, ingenious props, and a winning sense of humor, the star delivers delightful lessons in the natural laws of sexual attraction.

seasons.short_synopsis: Isabella Rossellini explores the maternal instincts of animals, both nurturing and ruthless. Slipping into the roles of mothers from across the animal kingdom, she reveals the wide-ranging—and often unexpected—ways different species protect, neglect, or abandon their young.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: Isabella Rossellini explores the maternal instincts of animals, both nurturing and ruthless. Slipping into the roles of mothers from across the animal kingdom, she reveals the wide-ranging—and often unexpected—ways different species protect, neglect, or abandon their young.
seasons.title: Mammas
seasons.default_editorial: Darwinian theories of evolution suggest that women are born caregivers—but a cheekily subversive Isabella Rossellini troubles that essentializing claim in Mammas. Getting into the mindset of various female creatures, she unravels assumptions about feminine nature with ticklish insight.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Darwinian theories of evolution suggest that women are born caregivers—but a cheekily subversive Isabella Rossellini troubles that essentializing claim in Mammas. Getting into the mindset of various female creatures, she unravels assumptions about feminine nature with ticklish insight.

items.title: Chapter 1
items.short_synopsis: Mussolini has just founded the Fasces of Combat when D’Annunzio takes Fiume. Mussolini hopes to exploit the feat of his poet on the field.

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.title: Mussolini: Son of the Century

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: Spanning the political chaos of 1920s Italy, Benito Mussolini transforms from socialist journalist to Italy’s brutal dictator, starting with his Blackshirts militia to the establishment of an authoritarian rule that would go on to set Europe aflame.

seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.default_editorial: Inhabiting Il Duce with bulldog pertinacity, Luca Marinelli summons a brutish extravagance for this spectacular limited series. With sforzando stylistic attack, director Joe Wright squares up to his subject’s monstrous ego and baneful pageantry for a vital portrait of despotism on the march.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Inhabiting Il Duce with bulldog pertinacity, Luca Marinelli summons a brutish extravagance for this spectacular limited series. With sforzando stylistic attack, director Joe Wright squares up to his subject’s monstrous ego and baneful pageantry for a vital portrait of despotism on the march.

items.title: The Unheavenly Host
items.short_synopsis: Spiritualist Mrs. Drusse tricks the doctors into admitting her into the neurosurgery ward of the Kingdom hospital, where she discovers the sounds of a weeping child in the elevator shaft. Swedish consultant Dr. Helmer is confronted by the results of his sloppy work treating a brain-damaged patient.
items.default_editorial: Strange things are happening in the underbelly of a Danish hospital in Lars von Trier’s long unavailable cult TV phenomenon. Stunningly restored in never-before-seen versions, The Kingdom I is a wickedly funny supernatural mystery. Let the battle between good and evil commence!

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

press_quote.quote: A glorious bone-rattler of shocks and satire

series.title: The Kingdom

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: Filmmaker Lars von Trier’s internationally acclaimed, cult classic series tells the story of a hospital built on top of the old bleaching ponds in Copenhagen, where evil has taken root and medical science faces a daily struggle with itself; where the Swedes curse the Danes, and the mysterious and inexplicable blend together in a mixture of horror and humor.
series.default_editorial: Director Lars von Trier’s magnum opus, The Kingdom is a TV phenomenon three decades in the making. A compulsively entertaining supernatural mystery, this incomparable blend of workplace comedy, potent melodrama, and nail-biting ghost story pitches science against superstition in unholy conflict.

seasons.short_synopsis: Strange things are happening in the underbelly of a Danish hospital, where the ghost of a young girl cries in the elevator shaft, a phantom ambulance appears nightly, and secret societies meet in the basement. Tensions rise among staff, oblivious to the dark force awakening beneath the hospital.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: Strange things are happening in the underbelly of a Danish hospital, where the ghost of a young girl cries in the elevator shaft, a phantom ambulance appears nightly, and secret societies meet in the basement. Tensions rise among staff, oblivious to the dark force awakening beneath the hospital.
seasons.title: The Kingdom I
seasons.default_editorial: Strange things are happening in the underbelly of a Danish hospital in Lars von Trier’s long unavailable, cult TV phenomenon. Masterfully harmonizing mordant humor and poignant pathos, The Kingdom I is a wickedly funny occult mystery. Let the battle between good and evil commence!
seasons.default_editorial_html: Strange things are happening in the underbelly of a Danish hospital in Lars von Trier’s long unavailable, cult TV phenomenon. Masterfully harmonizing mordant humor and poignant pathos, The Kingdom I is a wickedly funny occult mystery. Let the battle between good and evil commence!

seasons.short_synopsis: The troubled Kingdom Hospital continues to be plagued by the rise of a greater evil. The motley crew of physicians and administrators continue to squabble among themselves, unaware of the profound evil rising from the bowels of the haunted Copenhagen hospital.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: The troubled Kingdom Hospital continues to be plagued by the rise of a greater evil. The motley crew of physicians and administrators continue to squabble among themselves, unaware of the profound evil rising from the bowels of the haunted Copenhagen hospital.
seasons.title: The Kingdom II
seasons.default_editorial: Leaning into the inimitably jagged style he had refined through the making of Breaking the Waves, Lars von Trier returns to enrich the mythologies of his TV phenomenon. Moving nimbly between exhilarating farce and poignant pathos, The Kingdom II ushers in the ultimate battle between good and evil.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Leaning into the inimitably jagged style he had refined through the making of Breaking the Waves, Lars von Trier returns to enrich the mythologies of his TV phenomenon. Moving nimbly between exhilarating farce and poignant pathos, The Kingdom II ushers in the ultimate battle between good and evil.

seasons.short_synopsis: Years after darkness first surfaced beneath Kingdom Hospital, sleepwalker Karen is drawn to the haunted Kingdom Hospital by a voice in a dream. As Christmas nears, she teams up with porter Balder and surgeon Judith to banish its evil spirits, unaware that new staff bring secrets of their own.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: Years after darkness first surfaced beneath Kingdom Hospital, sleepwalker Karen is drawn to the haunted Kingdom Hospital by a voice in a dream. As Christmas nears, she teams up with porter Balder and surgeon Judith to banish its evil spirits, unaware that new staff bring secrets of their own.
seasons.title: The Kingdom Exodus
seasons.default_editorial: The Kingdom Exodus is Denmark’s answer to Twin Peaks: The Return—at once enriching and recontextualizing what came before. Wielding nostalgia like a matador, Lars von Trier lures us with its comforts before pulling them away to reveal the moral quandaries on which the iconic hospital shakily stands.
seasons.default_editorial_html: The Kingdom Exodus is Denmark’s answer to Twin Peaks: The Return—at once enriching and recontextualizing what came before. Wielding nostalgia like a matador, Lars von Trier lures us with its comforts before pulling them away to reveal the moral quandaries on which the iconic hospital shakily stands.

items.title: Northwest Passage
items.short_synopsis: The small northwest town of Twin Peaks, Washington, is shaken up when the body of the Homecoming Queen, Laura Palmer, is discovered washed up on a riverbank, wrapped in plastic.

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.title: Twin Peaks

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper comes to know the town’s inhabitants, their odd behaviors, and slowly learns that strange things are happening.
series.default_editorial: Refracting primetime soap operas and cop shows into a one-of-a-kind cosmic melodrama, showrunners Mark Frost and David Lynch captured lightning in a bottle. Cloaking its dark secrets in a down-home slice of winsome Americana, Twin Peaks is the pop-cultural juggernaut that captivated a generation.

seasons.short_synopsis: The sensational murder of the high school homecoming queen strips the veneer of respectable gentility from the rural community of Twin Peaks to expose its seething undercurrents. FBI agent Dale Cooper and Sheriff Harry S Truman join forces to investigate—and discover a town full of secrets.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: The sensational murder of the high school homecoming queen strips the veneer of respectable gentility from the rural community of Twin Peaks to expose its seething undercurrents. FBI agent Dale Cooper and Sheriff Harry S Truman join forces to investigate—and discover a town full of secrets.
seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.default_editorial: An ancient terror lurks beneath the homey facades of sleepy diners and cozy cabins in the iconic first season of Twin Peaks. Tread carefully, travelers, through this place where secrets and lies come wrapped in plastic. The picture-perfect image of small-town America is about to go up in flames.
seasons.default_editorial_html: An ancient terror lurks beneath the homey facades of sleepy diners and cozy cabins in the iconic first season of Twin Peaks. Tread carefully, travelers, through this place where secrets and lies come wrapped in plastic. The picture-perfect image of small-town America is about to go up in flames.

seasons.short_synopsis: FBI Agent Dale Cooper continues his investigation into Laura Palmer’s murder. As secrets surface and new threats emerge, the town of Twin Peaks grows ever stranger and more dangerous.
seasons.short_synopsis_html: FBI Agent Dale Cooper continues his investigation into Laura Palmer’s murder. As secrets surface and new threats emerge, the town of Twin Peaks grows ever stranger and more dangerous.
seasons.title: Season 2
seasons.default_editorial: As Laura Palmer’s furtive past continues to unravel in mysterious ways, the second season of Twin Peaks takes an unsettling detour into the mystical and supernatural. With a Pandora’s box containing the wicked truth now pried open, the moral darkness that haunts the American dream is soon unbound.
seasons.default_editorial_html: As Laura Palmer’s furtive past continues to unravel in mysterious ways, the second season of Twin Peaks takes an unsettling detour into the mystical and supernatural. With a Pandora’s box containing the wicked truth now pried open, the moral darkness that haunts the American dream is soon unbound.

items.short_synopsis: My log has a message for you.

series.short_synopsis: One of the most groundbreaking and influential broadcast series of all time, Twin Peaks followed the residents of a northwestern town stunned by the murder of homecoming queen Laura Palmer. Twenty-five years later, the story continues…

seasons.short_synopsis: One of the most groundbreaking and influential broadcast series of all time, Twin Peaks followed the residents of a northwestern town stunned by the murder of homecoming queen Laura Palmer. Twenty-five years later, the story continues…
seasons.short_synopsis_html: One of the most groundbreaking and influential broadcast series of all time, Twin Peaks followed the residents of a northwestern town stunned by the murder of homecoming queen Laura Palmer. Twenty-five years later, the story continues…
seasons.title: The Return
seasons.default_editorial: Dreams nest in nightmares, and nightmares in dreams, in Mark Frost and David Lynch’s electrifying return to the world of Twin Peaks. A monumental work of novelistic scope and grandeur, this limited series event slips the boundaries of space and time to prowl the charged line between good and evil.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Dreams nest in nightmares, and nightmares in dreams, in Mark Frost and David Lynch’s electrifying return to the world of Twin Peaks. A monumental work of novelistic scope and grandeur, this limited series event slips the boundaries of space and time to prowl the charged line between good and evil.

items.title: Pilot
items.short_synopsis: Hal and Harper’s childhood house is on the market, and Dad’s got even bigger news that’s about to send all three on a journey through time.

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.title: Hal & Harper

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: Hal and Harper have built their adult lives side by side in Los Angeles, bound by a lifetime of inside jokes and shared pain. When Dad announces he’s having a baby with his girlfriend, the siblings must reexamine their past and reckon with the versions of themselves they’ve carried into adulthood.

seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.default_editorial: Multi-hyphenate wunderkind Cooper Raiff (Cha Cha Real Smooth) writes, directs, and stars in this conceptually ambitious comic drama. With knockout performances from Lili Reinhart and Mark Ruffalo, Hal & Harper is a beautifully modulated examination of love, identity, and arrested development.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Multi-hyphenate wunderkind Cooper Raiff (Cha Cha Real Smooth) writes, directs, and stars in this conceptually ambitious comic drama. With knockout performances from Lili Reinhart and Mark Ruffalo, Hal & Harper is a beautifully modulated examination of love, identity, and arrested development.

items.title: The Boy With No Name
items.short_synopsis: While attending a religious boarding school, Pedro da Silva, an orphan, discovers his mother’s identity: the Countess Angela de Lima. With the help of Father Dinis, Pedro’s real guardian and protector, the Countess is given a chance to get to know the child he was forced to abandon.
items.default_editorial: A Borgesian matryoshka doll of storytelling, Mysteries of Lisbon is Chilean maestro Raúl Ruiz’s magnum opus—a sumptuous period epic in six parts. Playing in its rarely screened extended version, this sweeping melodramatic saga is Dickensian in scope and magisterial in novelistic ambition.

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.title: Mysteries of Lisbon

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.short_synopsis: In 19th-century Lisbon, a young boy named Joao begins to unravel the mystery of his parentage, setting off a sweeping tale of hidden identities, ancient secrets, and fateful encounters. Over three decades and across multiple countries, a web of interconnected lives slowly reveals its full design.

seasons.title: Mysteries of Lisbon
seasons.default_editorial: Raúl Ruiz’s sweeping melodramatic epic is magisterial in its novelistic ambition. A Dickensian saga of great expectations, this extended version presents Mysteries of Lisbon in six parts, providing a rare opportunity to get lost in the endlessly generating passageways of Ruiz’s complete vision.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Raúl Ruiz’s sweeping melodramatic epic is magisterial in its novelistic ambition. A Dickensian saga of great expectations, this extended version presents Mysteries of Lisbon in six parts, providing a rare opportunity to get lost in the endlessly generating passageways of Ruiz’s complete vision.

items.title: The French Doll
items.short_synopsis: Tragedy strikes when young Emili is shockingly murdered by a mysterious stranger. The other four girls present at the scene of the crime—Sae, Maki, Akiko, and Yuka—are unable to remember the killer’s face. The crime goes unsolved. Fifteen years later, Sae is paid a surprise visit on her wedding day.
items.default_editorial: Japanese master of the macabre Kiyoshi Kurosawa brings his incantatory gift for creeping dread to the small screen with this sinuous miniseries. An eerie, pungently atmospheric interrogation of historical trauma, Penance is a devastating psychological thriller that ratchets up tension from the jump.

content_rating.label: caution
content_rating.description: Contains material that may not be suitable for children or young adults.

series.title: Penance

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: A mysterious stranger approaches a group of young friends at a sleepy small town playground, then kidnaps and brutally murders one of the girls. Wracked with grief, the victim’s unhinged mother Asako demands that the shaken survivors identify the killer or face a penance of her choosing.

seasons.title: Penance
seasons.default_editorial: Kiyoshi Kurosawa has no fear of cinema’s many shapes and sizes, and his version of a television miniseries takes full advantage of its possibilities for storytelling. The result is a genre-bending, deeply immersive saga of a crime and a curse that follows four girls’s divergent paths into adulthood.
seasons.default_editorial_html: Kiyoshi Kurosawa has no fear of cinema’s many shapes and sizes, and his version of a television miniseries takes full advantage of its possibilities for storytelling. The result is a genre-bending, deeply immersive saga of a crime and a curse that follows four girls’s divergent paths into adulthood.

items.title: The Human Beast
items.short_synopsis: It is the start of the summer holidays for Quinquin, and it is also the start of a local killing spree after a woman is chopped up and fed to a cow found dead in an old bunker.
items.default_editorial: Presented in its original serialized form, this epitome of the arthouse TV series (is there such a thing?) is a first-class surreal whodunit which has already earned its place next to Twin Peaks. Who would have thought Bruno Dumont could make us laugh out loud? Enjoy: this is just the beginning.

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.title: Li'l Quinquin

content_rating.label: mature
content_rating.description: Contains material and themes suitable only for mature audiences.

series.short_synopsis: After a corpse is discovered inside a cow, a wild police investigation unfolds in a bizarre French village that has fallen prey to evil. Meanwhile, a band of young, mischievous scoundrels watches from the sides.

seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.default_editorial: In the world of Li’l Quinquin, stuffed cow is not a cordon bleu dish, but the bull’s-eye of a characterfully odd whodunit. Embracing all-out absurdity, French director Bruno Dumont sets the offbeat tempo for an ensemble cast, leading them—like a prankish bandmaster—into riotously weird scenarios.
seasons.default_editorial_html: In the world of Li’l Quinquin, stuffed cow is not a cordon bleu dish, but the bull’s-eye of a characterfully odd whodunit. Embracing all-out absurdity, French director Bruno Dumont sets the offbeat tempo for an ensemble cast, leading them—like a prankish bandmaster—into riotously weird scenarios.
